TopicTitle: Who made the yellow maintainence trucks? (cant find again)

Articles.Content:
Im going to slightly embarress myself here by asking a question that many would deem a little.. below standards..

but I love them little zippy electric maintainence trucks you see flying around the place in the hangar.. also theres a few parked stationary around KSC depot..

I once downloaded a mod of them and it worked beautifully.. actually I ended up using them as rescue vehicles.. they were an absolute pleasure to drive with a steering wheel and pedals.. sadly since 2 formats ago I lost them and ive been trying to remember who it was who made them and where I got it from..

I do remember it was one of them consolidation groups.. USI or LLL etc .. it was a picture I clicked on a whole collection of mods buried under more grand machinery..on one of the development threads..

I fondly recall the configuration file was slightly wrong resulting in eventual near light speed top speed if I kept the accelerator down

if anyone could help me out and point me in the right direction that'd be great

Thankfully I had a screenshot in one of my train threads to show what I mean.. with wheel sound mod they were the perfect combination of speed, stability and novelty

if anyone knows who makes them id love to know.. and perhaps through this thread gain a little more exposure

Edited November 3, 2015 by Overland
These are the Lack's Stock Extension, SXT, trucks. If that's the kind of answer you are looking for.

I have this mod. It's by those guys with the KSC++ thing. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/39086055/SXTTrucks.zip

P.S. Do you know the mod that adds trees and rocks?

Thanks for the replies LXT I think it is.. Seems a tad silly to miss something so simple but theyre very unique to drive.. Differnt from the complexity of a train that I usually pilot. These trucks with the ability to just get up and drive made them a wonderful addition to the fleet..

Time for a long care free scout run tomorrow many thanks

P.S. Do you know the mod that adds trees and rocks?

They are stock, you need to enable "Terrain Scatters" in your graphics settings.

It's just for show though, as they have no collision box.

I dont trust it... Ive had 1 train explode randomly and the only thing I could blame was a nearby tree... So I change course if ones coming too near..

Collision box or not..when a trees 30x the size of your craft.. Move to the side as it passes
I love that someone felt the need to put a radar altimeter on the dashboard of a cargo truck.

I love that someone felt the need to put a radar altimeter on the dashboard of a cargo truck.

These *are* Kerbals we are talking about, they are probably just future proofing against the day when wings are strapped to the trucks for makeshift spaceplanes.

These *are* Kerbals we are talking about, they are probably just future proofing against the day when wings are strapped to the trucks for makeshift spaceplanes.

Plus, it's important to know just how much air you're getting with that 'sick jump'.

I love that someone felt the need to put a radar altimeter on the dashboard of a cargo truck.

Well you can do some pretty long jumps on Mun crater sides.

Its kerbals we talk about after all
